skill_a.name: Emergency Operation
skill_a.description: Shoots 3 piercing attacks, dealing Electric DMG and accumulating Electric Anomaly Buildup.

description.desc: When there are 2 or more Hollow Special Operations Section 6 characters in your squad: When Active Skill or Bangboo Chain Attack hit Shocked enemies, the DMG increases by 45%. When attacking enemies under other non-Electric Anomalies, attacks accumulate 100% more Anomaly Buildup.

When there are 2 or more Hollow Special Operations Section 6 characters in your squad: When Active Skill or Bangboo Chain Attack hit Shocked enemies, the DMG increases by 56%. When attacking enemies under other non-Electric Anomalies, attacks accumulate 125% more Anomaly Buildup.

When there are 2 or more Hollow Special Operations Section 6 characters in your squad: When Active Skill or Bangboo Chain Attack hit Shocked enemies, the DMG increases by 67%. When attacking enemies under other non-Electric Anomalies, attacks accumulate 150% more Anomaly Buildup.

When there are 2 or more Hollow Special Operations Section 6 characters in your squad: When Active Skill or Bangboo Chain Attack hit Shocked enemies, the DMG increases by 78%. When attacking enemies under other non-Electric Anomalies, attacks accumulate 175% more Anomaly Buildup.

When there are 2 or more Hollow Special Operations Section 6 characters in your squad: When Active Skill or Bangboo Chain Attack hit Shocked enemies, the DMG increases by 90%. When attacking enemies under other non-Electric Anomalies, attacks accumulate 200% more Anomaly Buildup.

skill_c.name: Assault Time
skill_c.description: Shoots 1 powerful piercing attack, dealing Electric DMG and inflicting massive Electric Anomaly Buildup.

skill_a.name: Portable Machine Gun - Debt-Clearer
skill_a.description: Builds a machine gun and continuously shoots enemies, dealing massive <u>Physical DMG</u>.

description.desc: When there are 2 or more Cunning Hares character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 45%.
When there are 2 or more Cunning Hares character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 56%.
When there are 2 or more Cunning Hares character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 67%.
When there are 2 or more Cunning Hares character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 88%.
When there are 2 or more Cunning Hares character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 100%.

skill_c.name: Portable Machine Gun - Gatling Debt-Clearer
skill_c.description: Uses machine guns and cannons to continuously attack the target, dealing massive <u>Physical DMG</u>.

skill_a.name: Sweet and Juicy
skill_a.description: Shoots juice bullets at the character currently in-combat. If the bullet misses, the juice will remain on the ground for a while. Characters coming into contact with the juice will recover HP. The recovery effect can only trigger up to 15 times per combat.

description.desc: When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Active Skill recovers 20% more HP. Active Skill has 3 more charges.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Active Skill recovers 25% more HP. Active Skill has 3 more charges.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Active Skill recovers 30% more HP. Active Skill has 3 more charges.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Active Skill recovers 35% more HP. Active Skill has 3 more charges.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Active Skill recovers 40% more HP. Active Skill has 3 more charges.

skill_a.name: Rocket Barrage
skill_a.description: Sends rockets and molotov cocktails at the target enemy, dealing Fire DMG.

description.desc: When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 20%. When the target is a Organic enemy, this effect increases by an additional 15%.
When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 25%. When the target is a Organic enemy, this effect increases by an additional 19%.
When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 30%. When the target is a Organic enemy, this effect increases by an additional 23%.
When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 35%. When the target is a Organic enemy, this effect increases by an additional 27%.
When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 40%. When the target is a Organic enemy, this effect increases by an additional 30%.

skill_c.name: Rocket Blast!
skill_c.description: Jumps forward and fires a rocket, dealing Fire DMG to enemies in a large area ahead.

skill_a.name: Closer, Closer...
skill_a.description: Unleashes a series of slashes with dual blades, dealing <u>Physical DMG</u>.

description.desc: When there is at least 1 Attack character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 30%.
When there is at least 1 Attack character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 37.5%.
When there is at least 1 Attack character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 45%.
When there is at least 1 Attack character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 52.5%.
When there is at least 1 Attack character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 60%.

skill_c.name: That's Close Enough!
skill_c.description: Continually slashes the target, dealing massive <u>Physical DMG</u>.

skill_a.name: Revolver of Fortune
skill_a.description:
Uses a random bullet for different moves.
Powerful Firework Shell: Fires at the enemy with great force, dealing massive Physical DMG and accumulating a large amount of Physical Anomaly Buildup.
Regular Firework Shell: Fires at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and accumulating Physical Anomaly Buildup.
Paintball: Fails to fire as flowers leave the muzzle.

description.desc: When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 100% more Anomaly Buildup.
When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 125% more Anomaly Buildup.

skill_c.description: Fire continuous shots at the target, dealing <u>Physical DMG</u> and accumulating massive <u>Physical Anomaly Buildup</u>.

skill_a.name: Straight in the Heart
skill_a.description: Throws a dart at the target, dealing <u>Phyiscal DMG.</u>

description.desc: When there is at least 1 Pierce-type character in your squad. Bangboo Chain Attack: DMG increases by 30%.
When there is at least 1 Pierce-type character in your squad. Bangboo Chain Attack: DMG increases by 37.5%.

skill_c.description: Launches itself with a slingshot, flying towards the target and performing consecutive slashes, dealing massive <u>Physical DMG.</u>

skill_a.name: Ether Bubble
skill_a.description: Releases Ether bubbles that generate Energy for characters coming into contact with them.

description.desc: When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Ether bubbles come into contact with characters, they generate an additional 60% Energy for off-field characters.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Ether bubbles come into contact with characters, they generate an additional 70% Energy for off-field characters.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Ether bubbles come into contact with characters, they generate an additional 80% Energy for off-field characters.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Ether bubbles come into contact with characters, they generate an additional 90% Energy for off-field characters.
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad: Ether bubbles come into contact with characters, they generate an additional 100% Energy for off-field characters.

skill_a.description: Creates a heartfelt afternoon snack. The snack will generate Energy for the receiving Agent.

skill_a.description: Throws a bomb at the target, dealing <u>Fire DMG</u> and accumulating <u>Fire Anomaly Buildup</u>.

description.desc: When there 2 or more Fire Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 60% more Anomaly Buildup.

skill_a.name: Kiss of Temptation
skill_a.description: Enters the flying state, shooting homing bullets at enemies to deal <u>Ether DMG</u> and inflict <u>Ether Anomaly Buildup</u>.

description.desc: When there are at least 2 Ether Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 40% more Anomaly Buildup. After activating Bangboo Chain Attack, the coordination state lasts for 5 more seconds and can activate 4 more times.

When there are at least 2 Ether Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 50% more Anomaly Buildup. After activating Bangboo Chain Attack, the coordination state lasts for 6 more seconds and can activate 5 more times.

When there are at least 2 Ether Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 60% more Anomaly Buildup. After activating Bangboo Chain Attack, the coordination state lasts for 7 more seconds and can activate 6 more times.

When there are at least 2 Ether Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 70% more Anomaly Buildup. After activating Bangboo Chain Attack, the coordination state lasts for 8 more seconds and can activate 7 more times.

When there are at least 2 Ether Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 80% more Anomaly Buildup. After activating Bangboo Chain Attack, the coordination state lasts for 9 more seconds and can activate 8 more times.

skill_c.name: Kiss of Confusion
skill_c.description: Fires 3 homing bullets at the target and then enters the coordination state. Under this state, fires homing bullets in coordination with the on-field character's attacks, dealing Ether DMG and inflicting Ether Anomaly Buildup for up to 30s or 10 activations.

skill_a.name: Maximum Voltage
skill_a.description: Charges the enemy and continuously electrocutes the target, dealing <u>Electric DMG</u> and accumulating <u>Electric Anomaly Buildup</u>.

description.desc: When there are at least 2 Electric Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 60% more Anomaly Buildup.

skill_c.name: Billion Volt Thunderbolt!
skill_c.description: Continually electrocutes the target, dealing <u>Electric DMG</u> and inflict massive <u>Electric Anomaly Buildup</u>.

skill_a.name: Modded Ether Detector
skill_a.description:
Scans and excavates the nearby ground, then gives the character a random buff based on the Bangboo's stats:
Buff 1: Recovers HP.
Buff 2: Generates a Shield.
Buff 3: Increases Energy Regen.

description.desc: Triggered when there is at least 1 Support-type character in your squad: Active Skill's character buff effect is increased: Buff 1: HP Recovery increases by 20%. Buff 2: Shield generated increases by 20%. Buff 3: Energy Regen increases by 0.04 points/s.

Triggered when there is at least 1 Support-type character in your squad: Active Skill's character buff effect is increased: Buff 1: HP Recovery increases by 22.5%. Buff 2: Shield generated increases by 22.5%. Buff 3: Energy Regen increases by 0.05 points/s.

Triggered when there is at least 1 Support-type character in your squad: Active Skill's character buff effect is increased: Buff 1: HP Recovery increases by 25%. Buff 2: Shield generated increases by 25%. Buff 3: Energy Regen increases by 0.06 points/s.

Triggered when there is at least 1 Support-type character in your squad: Active Skill's character buff effect is increased: Buff 1: HP Recovery increases by 27.5%. Buff 2: Shield generated increases by 27.5%. Buff 3: Energy Regen increases by 0.07 points/s.

Triggered when there is at least 1 Support-type character in your squad: Active Skill's character buff effect is increased: Buff 1: HP Recovery increases by 30%. Buff 2: Shield generated increases by 30%. Buff 3: Energy Regen increases by 0.08 points/s.

skill_a.name: Knight, Charge Up!
skill_a.description: Jump repeatedly while riding Pale Bouncy and summon 3 Knight's Stars. When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, they recover Energy.

description.desc: When there is at least one Support character in your squad: When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, their ATK increases by 20 + Bangboo level × 1.2 for 10s.
When there is at least one Support character in your squad: When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, their ATK increases by 25 + Bangboo level × 1.4 for 10s.
When there is at least one Support character in your squad: When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, their ATK increases by 30 + Bangboo level × 1.6 for 10s.

When there is at least one Support character in your squad: When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, their ATK increases by 40 + Bangboo level × 2.0 for 10s.

skill_c.name: Knight, Bouncing Charge!
skill_c.description: Summons 3 Pale Bouncys which stomp up to 10 times in the area ahead, each time dealing Ether DMG to enemies within its attack range.

skill_a.name: Lavish Spending
skill_a.description: Strikes the target with a barrage of golden coins, dealing <u>Physical DMG</u> and accumulating <u>Physical Anomaly Buildup</u>.

skill_a.description: Pulls in nearby enemies and deals <u>Physical DMG</u> to all enemies hit.

description.desc: When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Active Skill attack range is increased, and DMG is increased by 30%.
When there is at least 1 Anomaly character in your squad: Active Skill attack range is increased, and DMG is increased by 37.5%.

When there are 2 or more Criminal Investigation Special Response Team characters in your squad: After using an Active Skill, there is a 50% chance to trigger a follow-up with 1 extra hit, up to a maximum of 3 consecutive triggers. Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 43%.

skill_c.name: Woof woof!
skill_c.description: Continuously bites and tears enemies in front, dealing massive Physical DMG.

skill_a.description: Uses a cardboard box to camouflage itself, inducing a taunt effect: While camouflaged, being attacked by enemies or reaching the camouflage time limit will trigger an explosion, dealing <u>Physical DMG</u> in an area.

skill_a.description: Jumps towards the target and executes a downward strike, dealing <u>Physical DMG</u> in an area. This skill is good at interrupting.
